column5: I have been busy so I havent posted in a bit but the fishing on simcoe has been nothing less the stellar.   I was excited to hit the lake this morning having a feeling that it could be a great day with the weather front we had moving in. and it didn't disappoint. we fished 95fow and for a couple hours the lakers were totally suicidal. I hooked 5 fish in less then 20 min.  Dan and I iced nearly 30 fish between the 2 of us and a few of my other buddies iced a bunch too.  just a great day out there. Nothing too big but steady action none the less. The fish shut down about a hour before the rain started and we headed out. All fish came on tubes.  heres some pics from the day     Dan with a bunch        and a few for me.....         weescot with one     Matt with a couple, his first ever whitie     Bruce with one
Some great fishin there Ryan ! I should have went today...
sometimes i dislike you. LOL. I HATE WORKING WEEKENDS!!!!!!  Better hook up next weekend brudda, good catchin!
Thanks guys           LOL... we'll kill em next weekend man
Was a great day to be out there....good to see lots of fish caught!
While you were killing them, I managed to get NOTHING while all the others in my group (4 others) managed at least two hookups.

wow,, if that's not enough inspiration to get you off your butt  and get out there ,, you might want to check your pulse!  game on , simcoe . gear is gettin' loaded in the truck tonight!  great post !! just what i needed, thanks!
holy smokes!!! how come every time i go out there it's slow!! geez! i must suck!    good going guys..
Great report and pics Ryan  Man you guys really have those lakers dialed-in    Congratulations Thanks for sharing your great day with us Also congratulations to Matt for his first white  Leechman
That's some good fishing right there.  Congrats on a fine day indeed.
